(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (RB Here))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN episode))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP Meat)
            (CC and)
            (NNP Greed)))
        (VP (VBN shown)
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP (CD 5)))
          (NP (NNP June))
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB where))
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (VP (VBD introduced)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Fatty) (NNP Cheong) (POS 's))
                  (NNP Bu) (NNP Jian) (NNP Tian) (NNP Charsiew))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(episode-4, Here-1)
cop(episode-4, 's-2)
det(episode-4, the-3)
root(ROOT-0, episode-4)
prep(episode-4, of-5)
pobj(of-5, Meat-6)
cc(Meat-6, and-7)
conj(Meat-6, Greed-8)
partmod(episode-4, shown-9)
prep(shown-9, on-10)
pobj(on-10, 5-11)
tmod(shown-9, June-12)
advmod(introduced-15, where-13)
nsubj(introduced-15, I-14)
advcl(shown-9, introduced-15)
nn(Cheong-17, Fatty-16)
poss(Charsiew-22, Cheong-17)
possessive(Cheong-17, 's-18)
nn(Charsiew-22, Bu-19)
nn(Charsiew-22, Jian-20)
nn(Charsiew-22, Tian-21)
dobj(introduced-15, Charsiew-22)
